en-US.name: Prospector's Predicament
en-US.summary: A new scenario set in the days of the old west! Includes brand new soundtrack and over 230 new event tracks.
en-US.description: A new scenario set in the days of the old west! Includes brand new soundtrack and over 230 new event tracks.

customProductPrompts.purchasePromptDescription: A new scenario set in the days of the old west! Includes brand new soundtrack and over 230 new event tracks.
customProductPrompts.boughtCardDescription: Congrats! Prospector's Predicament purchase was successful and will now be inserted into the random selection for battle scenarios!

testingInstructions: Ask Dart Battle 'How do I get more scenarios?' and follow the prompts to purchase Prospector's Predicament.
